title: Internship - Software Developer
description:
Development of an internal tool for non-regression validation and testing of IDP project services, focused on GDPR-compliant image and document management. It supports multiple services, user authentication via Keycloak, and various file management and export functionalities.

Key technical contributions:
- Backend development using FastAPI, then migration to Django.
- Implementation of an authentication and permission management system with Keycloak.
- Design and development of a connector for RAD LAD, facilitating non-regression testing.
- Creation of a WEB dashboard in Angular, using the company's design system.

Skills and technologies:
- Backend: Django, FastAPI
- Database: MongoDB
- Project management: Jira, Scrum methodology
- Frontend: Angular

Major technical challenge:
- Transition from FastAPI to Django, requiring rapid skill development in Django.

title: Freelance - Web Developer
description:
Design and development of a complete web platform for IDEA Explorer.

- Frontend: development from a Figma mockup using Next.js and Tailwind CSS.
- Backend: creation of a performant REST API with MongoDB for the database, and implementation of business logic.
- Infrastructure: use of Docker for isolated development environment, facilitating deployment and maintenance.
- Collaboration: working in pairs with a freelance UX/UI designer (Kylian), in complete autonomy, with regular check-ins with the client.

title: Internship - Software developer
description: I developed a web configuration panel using Angular for a photo analysis tool, primarily used by banks and insurance companies to process administrative documents, during my internship at Luminess.

title: Internship - Front-end developer
description: A remote internship in a start-up that develops a discord bot. I was in charge of the front-end part of the showcase website and a part of the dashboard.

title: Internship - Developer
location: Centre hospitalier intercommunal Elbeuf Louviers Val de Reuil
description: Start of the development of a web application for the hospital's workers. I was in charge of the front-end and back-end part of the application.

title: UX/UI Design Specialization Program
description: Specialized program in UX/UI design at the School of Engineering, focusing on user experience and interface design principles, methodologies, and practical applications.

title: High School Diploma in Industrial and Sustainable Development Technologies
